mapper.insert: insert into `trackstudent` (age, gender, name, sale_id, track_times, prevDate, visitDate, nextDate, QQ, tel, school, intention, campus_id, class_id, status, track_state, remark, education,subject_id,email,formBuildDate,weChat,inputTime, address,major,source_id,clientType_id,focusProblem,hasPaid,introducerStu_id,introducer,communicationMethod_id,enrollUniversityDate ,tracePurpose_id,consultationTime,summary,communicationContext,bigCustomer_id,auditResult,auditContext,score_id ) values (#{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gender,jdbcType=BIT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employee.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{trackTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{prevDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{visitDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{nextDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intention.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{campus.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{classGrade.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{trackState,jdbcType=BIT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{education.id,jdbcType=BIGINT} ,#{subject.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{email},#{formBuildDate},#{weChat},#{inputTime}, #{address},#{major},#{source.id},#{clientType.id},#{focusProblem},#{hasPaid},#{introducerStu.id},#{introducer}, #{communicationMethod.id},#{enrollUniversityDate},#{tracePurpose.id},#{consultationTime},#{summary},#{communicationContext},#{bigCustomer.id}, #{auditResult},#{auditContext},#{score.id})
mapper.update: update `trackstudent` set age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=BIT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sale_id = #{employee.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, track_times = #{trackTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, prevDate = #{prevDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, visitDate = #{visitDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, nextDate = #{nextDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, QQ = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, school = #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, intention = #{intention.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, campus_id = #{campus.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, class_id = #{classGrade.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, status = #{status.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, track_state = #{trackState,jdbcType=BIT}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, education = #{education.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, subject_id=#{subject.id}, email=#{email}, formBuildDate=#{formBuildDate}, weChat=#{weChat}, inputTime=#{inputTime}, address=#{address}, major=#{major}, source_id=#{source.id}, clientType_id=#{clientType.id}, focusProblem=#{focusProblem}, hasPaid=#{hasPaid}, introducerStu_id=#{introducerStu.id}, introducer=#{introducer}, communicationMethod_id=#{communicationMethod.id}, enrollUniversityDate=#{enrollUniversityDate}, tracePurpose_id=#{tracePurpose.id}, consultationTime=#{consultationTime}, summary=#{summary}, communicationContext=#{communicationContext}, bigCustomer_id=#{bigCustomer.id}, auditResult=#{auditResult}, auditContext=#{auditContext}, score_id=#{score.id} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select ps.id, ps.age,ps.email, ps.gender, ps.name,e.id e_id,e.username e_username, ps.track_times, ps.prevDate, ps.visitDate, ps.nextDate,ps.formBuildDate,ps.introducer, ps.QQ, ps.tel, e.id=ps.sale_id LEFT JOIN classgrade cg ON cg.id=ps.class_id LEFT JOIN systemdictionaryitem intention ON intention.id=ps.intention LEFT JOIN systemdictionaryitem campus ON campus.id=ps.campus_id LEFT JOIN systemdictionaryitem status ON status.id=ps.status LEFT JOIN systemdictionaryitem education ON education.id=ps.education LEFT JOIN systemdictionaryitem subject ON subject.id=ps.subject_id LEFT tracePurpose.id=ps.tracePurpose_id LEFT JOIN systemdictionaryitem communicationMethod ON communicationMethod.id=ps.communicationMethod_id LEFT JOIN universitytrace bc ON bc.id=ps.bigCustomer_id LEFT JOIN systemdictionaryitem sc ON sc.id=ps.score_id LEFT JOIN potentitalStudent ps1 ON ps1.id=ps.introducerStu_id

select COUNT(ps.id) from `trackstudent` ps LEFT JOIN employee e ON e.id=ps.sale_id LEFT JOIN classgrade cg ON cg.id=ps.class_id LEFT JOIN systemdictionaryitem intention ON intention.id=ps.intention LEFT JOIN systemdictionaryitem campus ON campus.id=ps.campus_id LEFT JOIN systemdictionaryitem status ON status.id=ps.status LEFT JOIN systemdictionaryitem education ON education.id=ps.education LEFT JOIN systemdictionaryitem subject ON subject.id=ps.subject_id LEFT JOIN systemdictionaryitem source ON source.id=ps.source_id LEFT JOIN universitytrace bc ON bc.id=ps.bigCustomer_id LEFT JOIN systemdictionaryitem tracePurpose ON tracePurpose.id=ps.tracePurpose_id LEFT JOIN systemdictionaryitem sc ON sc.id=ps.score_id LEFT JOIN systemdictionaryitem clientType ON clientType.id=ps.clientType_id LEFT JOIN systemdictionaryitem communicationMethod ON communicationMethod.id=ps.communicationMethod_id LEFT JOIN potentitalStudent ps1 ON ps1.id=ps.introducerStu_id LIMIT #{beginIndex},#{rows}

update `trackstudent` set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sale_id = #{employee.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, auditResult=#{auditResult}^1, auditContext=#{auditContext}, score_id=#{score.id}, communicationMethod_id=#{communicationMethod.id} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
